message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9500. I believe it's a great deal for you, considering its value to you. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell at $9500. However, I am only able to pay up to $9000 for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I'm open to negotiation, $9000 is a bit low for me. How about we split the difference and settle on $9250? This would be a fair price for both of us.
